 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רָעַשׁ‎</span>] **verb** ==quake, shake==, intransitive (Late Hebrew = Biblical Hebrew, so Aramaic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> (rare), and (once) <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רְשְַׁ‎</span> ***toss, rage*** (of sea); Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, usually <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, (loan-word?), ***tremble, quiver, quake***; compare perhaps Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***rêšu***</u></abbr>, ***exult***); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רָעֲשָׁה‎</span> [[Jer.8.16|Jer 8:16]]; [[Jer.49.21|Jer 49:21]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רָעָ֑שָׁה‎</span> [[Judg.5.4|Judg 5:4]]; [[Ps.68.9|Ps 68:9]] 3 plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רָעֲשׁוּ‎</span> [[Joel.2.10|Joel 2:10]] +, etc. ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִרְעַשׁ‎</span> [[Ps.72.16|Ps 72:16]], 3 feminine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תִּרְעַשְׁנָה‎</span> [[Ezek.26.10|Ezek 26:10]], etc.; ***Participle*** plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רֹעֲשִׁים‎</span> [[Jer.4.24|Jer 4:24]] — ***quake, shake***, of earth [[Judg.5.4|Judg 5:4]] = [[Ps.68.9|Ps 68:9]], [[2Sam.22.8|2Sam 22:8]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רגז‎</span>) = [[Ps.18.8|Ps 18:8]] (\|\| ***id.***), [[Ps.77.19|Ps 77:19]] (+ <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רגז‎</span>), also [[Isa.13.13|Isa 13:13]] (with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַלכֵּֿן‎</span>, + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִמְּקוֺמוֺ‎</span>, pregnantly; \|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רָגַז‎</span>), [[Jer.51.29|Jer 51:29]] with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִן‎</span> causative [[Jer.8.16|Jer 8:16]]; [[Jer.10.10|Jer 10:10]]; [[Jer.49.21|Jer 49:21]] of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מוֺסְדֵי אָ֑רֶץ‎</span> [[Isa.24.18|Isa 24:18]] of heavens [[Joel.2.10|Joel 2:10]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לִפְנֵי‎</span> causative; \|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רָגַז‎</span>); heavens and earth [[Joel.4.16|Joel 4:16]] mountains [[Jer.4.24|Jer 4:24]]; [[Nah.1.5|Nah 1:5]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִן‎</span> person causative ), [[Ps.46.4|Ps 46:4]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ב‎</span> causative ); walls [[Ezek.26.10|Ezek 26:10]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִן‎</span> causative ); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אִיִּים‎</span> v[[Ezek.26.15|Ezek 26:15]] (id.); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִגְרשׁוֺת‎</span> [[Ezek.27.28|Ezek 27:28]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ל‎</span> causative ); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַסִּפִּים‎</span> [[Amos.9.1|Amos 9:1]] all living things [[Ezek.38.20|Ezek 38:20]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִפָּנַי‎</span> causative ); of waving grain [[Ps.72.16|Ps 72:16]]. **Niph\`al** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִרְעֲשָׁה הָאָרֶץ‎</span> [[Jer.50.46|Jer 50:46]] ***is made to quake*** (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִקּוֺל‎</span>). **Hiph\`il** ***Perfect*** 2 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִרְעַשְׁתָּה‎</span> [[Ps.60.4|Ps 60:4]] 1 singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַרְעַשְׁתִּי‎</span> [[Ezek.31.16|Ezek 31:16]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְהִר‎</span> consecutive [[Hag.2.7|Hag 2:7]] ***Imperfect*** 2 masculine singular suffix 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎(הֲ)תַרְעִישֶׁנּוּ‎</span> [[Job.39.20|Job 39:20]] ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַרְעִישׁ‎</span> [[Isa.14.16|Isa 14:16]] + 2 t.; — 

**1.** ***cause to quake***, subject <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>, with accusative of heavens, earth, nations, etc., [[Hag.2.6|Hag 2:6]]; [[Hag.2.7|Hag 2:7]]; [[Hag.2.21|Hag 2:21]], compare [[Ps.60.4|Ps 60:4]] nations + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִקּוֺל‎</span> [[Ezek.31.16|Ezek 31:16]] subject man, with accusative of kingdoms [[Isa.14.16|Isa 14:16]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַרְגִּיז‎</span>). 

**2.** ***cause*** (horse) ***to spring, leap*** (like locust), man subject, [[Job.39.20|Job 39:20]].
